revenue.notes: Record quarterly revenue driven by accelerating Data Center demand

highlights: Exceptional Hopper/H200 demand with sequential double-digit billions in H200 sales
Customers deployed tens of thousands of GPUs for training, inference, and sovereign AI build-outs
Blackwell in production – initial private preview instances with Microsoft, Oracle’s Zettascale clusters, and partner offerings around the world
Strong back-to-school demand, healthy channel inventory, and new RTX AI PC launches with Copilot+ features
GeForce RTX AI PCs shipping from ASUS and MSI with 321 AI TOPS
AI, autonomous-vehicle simulation, and digital twin workloads continue to lift workstation demand
Record Orin revenue as Volvo ramps electric SUV programs and new automotive AI deployments gain traction

from_operations.notes: Driven by the record profit quarter

cash_paid_PP&E.notes: Investing in continued data center and AI capacity build-out

data_center: H200 powered cloud instances expanded across AWS, CoreWeave, and Azure with Google Cloud and OCI coming soon
Blackwell achieved production scale with early deployments from Oracle, Microsoft, Google, and sovereign customers
ai_integration: Blackwell debuted on MLPerf Training with 2.2x performance vs Hopper and a 4x cost reduction on GPT-3 benchmarks
NVIDIA NIM now deployed by ~1,000 customers and AI enterprise software revenue annualizing at $1.5B, marching toward $2B
networking_and_inference: Spectrum-X Ethernet revenue grew 3x YoY while InfiniBand, SmartNICs, and BlueField DPUs remained in heavy demand
Networking sequential dip attributed to mix while pipeline stays strong ahead of Blackwell availability
gaming_and_edge: RTX content expansion and Copilot+ PCs propelled gaming revenue up 15% YoY while supply tightness eased into holiday season
Copilot+ PCs with Windows 11 and AI experiences (Recall, Click to Do, Windows Search) proliferated alongside premium notebooks
sovereign_and_partner: Sovereign AI programs in India, Japan, and Europe continued to adopt Omniverse, AI Aerial, and InfiniBand-powered supercomputers
Consulting partners like Accenture and Deloitte trained thousands of professionals on NVIDIA AI Technology for new enterprise deployments

q4_guidance.other_income: Income of ≈0.4 billion USD excluding non-affiliated investment volatility

longer_term.capex: Investments accelerate to support continued Blackwell/NIM ramps while margin mix improves as the product family scales
longer_term.gross_margin_direction: Expect low-70s spreading into mid-70s as Blackwell mix settles

metadata.source: NVIDIA Q3 FY2025 earnings release and transcript
